text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Cord blood transplant center" means a medical facility that uses cells obtained from a human umbilical cord or placenta to treat pediatric or adult patients afflicted with a disease or injury.
"Fund" means the Cord Blood Transplant Center Support Fund.

"Qualified medical institution" means a medical institution accredited by the Joint Commission on Accreditation of Health Care Organizations that:
Is located in the State; and
Has an established hematologic malignancies research program.
